message.content:
{"id": "7785", 
"title": "Bug 7785: SaveAs Forgets the file type", 
"description": "When performing a SaveAs operation in the software, the file type is not being remembered properly. Additionally, the icon associated with the file changes from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.", 
"OB": "1) Open an existing java file.", 
"EB": "The file type should be remembered correctly after performing the SaveAs operation. The icon associated with the file should not change from the parent java file icon to a generic file icon.", 
"SR": "1) Open an existing java file.
2) Modify the file.
3) Click the SaveAs icon next to the Save icon.
4) A dialog should appear.
5) Browse for a valid container location.
6) Enter the filename without the extension.
7) Click Ok.
8) Verify that the file is added to the specified location with the proper file extension in the Navigator."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '7785', 'title': 'Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type', 'description': 'Bug 7785SaveAs Forgets the file type The icon has also changed from the parent javafile icon to a generic file icon. ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': "1) Open an existing java file2) Modify it (I moved an existing class)3) Click the SaveAs icon, next to the Save IconA dialog will come up.4) Browse for a valid container location5) Type the filename, but ignore the extension, which isn't requested.6) Click Ok.Observe that the Navigator has added the file in the specified location, butwith no file extension shown. "}
